name: rub_arc_kill_17
text: Who is the ultimate magus? That's right, I am.
text_simple: who is the ultimate magus thats right i am

name: rub_arc_rival_01
text: Tsk tsk tsk tsk, poor show Arsenal Magus.
text_simple: tsk tsk tsk tsk poor show arsenal magus

name: rub_arc_rival_02
text: Even the Arsenal Magus falls before my magic.
text_simple: even the arsenal magus falls before my magic

name: rub_arc_rival_03
text: Invoker, your ego is as big as the crater I leave you in.
text_simple: invoker your ego is as big as the crater i leave you in

name: rub_arc_rival_04
text: A taste of your own medicine.
text_simple: a taste of your own medicine

name: rub_arc_rival_05
text: I'll see your silence is eternal.
text_simple: ill see your silence is eternal

name: rub_arc_rival_06
text: Whatever do you have against me?
text_simple: whatever do you have against me

name: rub_arc_rival_09
text: So you keep a book for your spells? Good idea.
text_simple: so you keep a book for your spells good idea

name: rub_arc_rival_10
text: The cold has numbed you to wonder, Lich.
text_simple: the cold has numbed you to wonder lich

name: rub_arc_rival_11
text: Sad to see such rare sorcery go to waste.
text_simple: sad to see such rare sorcery go to waste

name: rub_arc_rival_12
text: Your spells are but rot to me.
text_simple: your spells are but rot to me

name: rub_arc_rival_13
text: May the arts of oblivion die with you, Pugna.
text_simple: may the arts of oblivion die with you pugna

name: rub_arc_rival_14
text: I am honored to have faced a shaman's skill.
text_simple: i am honored to have faced a shamans skill

name: rub_arc_rival_15
text: I didn't think your sorcery could keep you aloft.
text_simple: i didnt think your sorcery could keep you aloft
